725:3: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatavajradhāraṇīsamayasaṃbhavādhiṣṭhānannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajrasāvitre svāhā||
725:4: atha vajrāpāṇirmahābodhisatvaḥ punarapīmaṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajradhāri hūṃ||
725:6: atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsatva imāṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajraratnagotre svāhā||
725:7: atha vajranetro bodhisatvo mahāsatva imāṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajrapadmanetre hūṃ phaṭ||
725:8: atha vajraviśvo bodhisatvo mahāsatva imāṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajrakarmakari hūṃ||
725:9: atha vajravidyottamo bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajraśūlāgre svāhā||
725:10: atha vajramāyo vidyārāja imāṃ svamudrāmabhāṣat oṃ vajracakre hūṃ||
725:15: atha vajrakuṇḍalirvajrakrodha imāṃ samayamudrāmabhāṣat oṃ jvālāvajre hūṃ||
725:16: atha vajraprabha uvāca oṃ vajrasaumye hūṃ||
725:20: atha vajraśauṇḍaḥ svasamayamudrāmabhāṣat oṃ vajrameda hūṃ||
725:25: atha vajramusalaḥ svasamayamudrāmudājahāra oṃ vajramusala-grahe hūṃ||
725:45: bhīmāṃ śriyaṃ sarasvatīṃ durgāṃ koṇeṣu vāmataḥ|
725:46: bāhyakoṇeṣu mudrā vai āsāmeva tu saṃlikhet||5||
725:50: athatra vajramaṇḍale yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā vajrāṅku śādibhiḥ samayakarma kṛtvā,
725:52: brūyān “na kasyacittvayā adṛṣṭasamayastaitāḥ samayamudrāḥ purato vaktavyāḥ,
725:57: yatra patati sāsya samayamudrā vaśya bhavati ā||
725:64: tatrāsyā hṛdayaṃ bhavati oṃ sarvavajragāmini sarvabhakṣe sādhaya guhyavajriṇi hūṃ phaṭ||
725:69: sarvamudrāmanasottamānyapi sarvakarmāṇi kurvantī” tyāha bhagavān vajradharaḥ||
725:73: mukhorṇā ca mukhoddhāntā mūrdhni sthāpya dvidhikṛte||ti||1||
725:75: anayā bandhayā samyak sidhyed vidyottamaḥ svayam||2||
725:78: cakrā sarvāṅgasaṃpīḍā ghaṇṭā mudrā tathaiva ca|
725:81: jvālā parigrahā caiva prabhā saṃgrahameva ca|
725:84: pānamudrā ca mālā ca vajrā ca ṣṭaṃbhanāmitā|
